articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: This is the world’s biggest stock winner of 2022 with 1,600% gain - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Shares of PT Adaro Minerals Indonesia have moved sideways since sliding from a peak in April, but are still handsomely beating peers in the 2,803-member Bloomberg World Index — delivering more than double the returns of runner-up Turkish Airlines.
